courses.who_for: Tennessee teens (15–17) or new drivers seeking driver education for insurance discounts or voluntary training.
requirements: Not required for licensing (state requires 50 hrs supervised driving instead)

submission.certificate: Given by provider; submit to insurance company for discounts
submission.deadlines: None statewide; insurance typically requires recent completion

court_vs_insurance.court: Sometimes ordered in juvenile traffic cases.
court_vs_insurance.insurance: Most insurers offer 5–10% discounts for completion.
